## MemoryStat type

Union of all supported memory stat types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MemoryStat = HeapSpace | ProcessMemoryStat;
```

**References:** [HeapSpace](./memoru.heapspace.md)<!-- -->, [ProcessMemoryStat](./memoru.processmemorystat.md)
